sessions.name: AWS Late Night Week 1
sessions.description: Kick off each week in typical re:Invent style with a night of fun, entertainment, and surprises!

sessions.name: Come architettare una soluzione di rendering 3D a basso costo con istanze spot (caso d'uso: Ferrari)
sessions.description: In questa sessione parleremo dei benefici tecnologici ed economici legati all’utilizzo di servizi AWS per la gestione di applicazioni di rendering 3D. Ferrari racconterà come ha costruito un servizio efficiente di rendering, utilizzando le istanze GPU di ultima generazione e creando una modalità dinamica di assegnazione delle risorse basato su istanze di tipo Spot.
sessions.hiddenTags: __italian,amazon elastic compute cloud (amazon ec2),amazon cloudfront,amazon simple storage service (amazon s3)

sessions.name: 「世界の17億人を救う」AWSで実現するGMSの金融包摂型フィンテック
sessions.description: Global Mobility Service (GMS)は、既存の金融から取り残された人々が豊かになるチャンスを創造するための金融包摂型フィンテックサービスをアジアの４カ国で提供しています。本セッションでは独自の車載IoTデバイスからAWS上のプラットフォームに蓄積された、約1.8億キロメートル、地球約4,443周分に相当する膨大な走行データを分析し、ローン審査等に活用するAWSのデータレイク採用の経緯、構築・活用のポイントについてご紹介します。

sessions.name: Acelere el entrenamiento y automatice el despliegue de sus modelos de Machine Learning
sessions.description: Aprenda como convertir un Jupyter Notebook en un pipeline de Machine Learning, completamente automatizado, utilizando Amazon SageMaker. En esta sesión mostraremos, paso a paso, el proceso para entrenar un modelo de Machine Learning utilizando tres distintos algoritmos del framework Scikit-learn de forma paralela, realizaremos la optimización de hiperparámetros para cada uno de los algoritmos, evaluaremos el desempeño de los 3 modelos entrenados y seleccionaremos el que mejor desempeño obtenga, para finalmente desplegarlo como un endpoint. El resultado final será un workflow completamente automatizado mediante el uso Amazon SageMaker, en combinación con AWS Step Functions y Amazon CloudWatch Events.

sessions.name: Implementación de un Datalake en una compañía CPG
sessions.description: La industria de bienes de consumo envasados (CPG) genera volumenes de datos masivos, muchas veces almacenados en diferentes sistemas incomunicados entre si, esto dificulta el análisis. La presente sesión explora las motivaciones para la construcción de un datalake orientado a la industria de CPG. Se presenta una arquitectura de referencia que cubre desde la ingesta de datos hasta su explotación por medio de herramientas de analítica y aprendizaje automático. Y se exponen las experiencias y lecciones aprendidas obtenidas por Coca Cola Andina durante la implementación de su datalake regional.

sessions.name: Execute ETL em tempo real com AWS Glue
sessions.description: Muitas vezes, decisões precisam ser tomadas em tempo real, no momento em que o dado é gerado. Nesta sessão, veremos como lidar com esta situação usando a nova funcionalidade de ETL streaming do AWS Glue. Esse recurso facilita a configuração de pipelines de ingestão contínua que preparam dados de streaming instantaneamente e os disponibilizam para análise em segundos. Veja na prática uma demonstração de dados simulados de dispositivos IoT (táxis) sendo ingeridos, transformados, armazenados e visualizados em tempo real usando Amazon Kinesis, AWS Glue, Amazon Athena e Amazon Elasticsearch.

sessions.name: Come abilitare il lavoro da remoto nel cloud (caso d'uso: Comune di Cagliari)
sessions.description: Le organizzazioni di tutto il mondo sono sempre più alla ricerca di opzioni che consentano ai dipendenti di lavorare in sicurezza da qualsiasi luogo, sia nel settore privato che nella PA. In questa sessione, approfondiremo alcune delle tecniche e dei servizi che ti permettono di configurare un ambiente di lavoro basato su Amazon WorkSpace per il lavoro da remoto. Inoltre, il Comune di Cagliari racconterà come è riuscito ad affrontare questa sfida nel 2020, abilitando circa 500 impiegati al lavoro da casa.

sessions.name: AWS IoT Greengrass 및 Amazon SageMaker를 통한 엣지 기반 기계 학습 추론하기
sessions.description: 대량의 사물인터넷(IoT) 데이터가 엣지(Edge)로 확장되어 기계 학습 추론에 활용되고 있습니다. 엣지에서 클라우드로, 클라우드에서 엣지로의 데이터 이동을 통해 비즈니스 요구 사항을 보다 효과적으로 충족할 수 있습니다. 이 세션에서는 Amazon SageMaker에서 모델 학습 후, AWS IoT Greengrass 기반 고성능 ML 추론이 가능한 LG전자의 AIoT 디바이스에 손쉽게 배포 및 활용할 수 있는 엣지 기반 기계 학습 기법을 소개합니다.

sessions.name: Making tech inclusive and accessible through AI
sessions.description: In this session, Miku Hirano, CEO of Cinnamon, Inc., talks about how she founded an artificial intelligence (AI) startup out of her passion and desire to use technology to change the world, making it more inclusive and accessible. Miku, winner of the Woman of the Year 2019 Award from Nikkei Woman in Japan, discusses how her company’s products and services have reached customers in Japan, Singapore, the US, Vietnam, Taiwan, and beyond, with the mission of extending human potential with AI.

sessions.name: Build a modern technology foundation for your company's future
sessions.description: Technology is always evolving. Learn how the cloud model of technology delivery differs from legacy IT service delivery methods and how the AWS Cloud can help you better scale your technology platform securely, quickly, and flexibly to meet changing business needs.

sessions.name: The value of innovation in challenging times
sessions.description: During challenging times, many companies pause on innovation. History shows that companies that find the right balance between efficiency and innovation have a higher probability of long-term success. Come learn how AWS can help your company innovate.

sessions.name: Exam Readiness: AWS Certified Developer - Associate
sessions.description: Join us for this 3-hour, on-demand exam readiness session. An AWS trainer will walk you through the AWS Certified Developer - Associate exam structure. Focus your preparation by exploring the exam’s topic areas and identifying areas to study.

sessions.name: AWS Certification Explainer: Exam Scoring
sessions.description: Are you curious about your AWS Certification exam score? Learn how scaled scoring works and how to understand your exam score with help from an AWS Certification Technical Architect.

sessions.name: Discover the Value of AWS Partner Accreditations
sessions.description: Get a quick overview on why achieving AWS Partner Accreditation is a great first step toward building your skills and confidence with the AWS Cloud.

sessions.name: No more idling: Creating parallel builds using serverless CI
sessions.description: Ever find yourself or your teams waiting for builds to start and finish? In this session, learn how to use the speed and parallelization of AWS Lambda so your development teams can move faster. This session reviews what the limits are and how you can set up fallbacks using AWS Fargate or AWS CodeBuild. You learn about AWS Lambda layers, Amazon EFS, and the best available AWS tools for super-fast builds.

sessions.name: Learn how AWS prepares students for cloud roles in India
sessions.description: Get a quick overview as Veeraj Thaploo, CTO of Blazeclan, discusses how the AWS Academy program helps identify the right student candidates from Academy partner institutes.

sessions.name: AWS Certified Machine Learning - Specialty
sessions.description: Get a quick overview of how AWS Certified Machine Learning - Specialty validates your expertise in building, training, tuning, and deploying machine learning models on AWS.

sessions.name: AWS Certified Database - Specialty
sessions.description: Get a quick overview of how AWS Certified Database - Specialty validates your expertise in recommending, designing, and maintaining the optimal AWS database solution.

sessions.name: SMC & AWS Educate create curriculum for CA Cloud Workforce
sessions.description: Get a quick overview of how the California Cloud Workforce Project (“CA Cloud”), a consortium of LA County community colleges and high schools, is helping students prepare for a career in the cloud.

sessions.name: Building the next generation of residential robots
sessions.description: Robots are being used more widely in homes, and they are becoming increasingly advanced and include capabilities like artificial intelligence, data streaming, image recognition, voice activation, and remote monitoring. In this session, see how AWS RoboMaker and AWS IoT enable the development and testing of sophisticated robots that can autonomously navigate, communicate, comprehend, and learn. iRobot also discusses how it is using AWS to build intelligent robots that fit seamlessly into your life at home.

sessions.name: Gérer Transit Gateway à l'échelle par l'automatisation
sessions.description: AWS Transit Gateway est souvent désigné comme le service "hub and spoke" par excellence, mais il n'est pas toujours évident de réaliser puis utiliser le plein potentiel du service pour adresser des besoins réseaux plus complexes. Après une brève présentation du service, cette session présente une méthodologie permettant de gérer un réseau de complexité arbitraire à l'échelle grâce à Transit Gateway, avant d'expliquer comment transcrire cette méthodologie en automatisation.

sessions.name: Usando Machine Learning para combater evasão escolar
sessions.description: A Betha Sistemas é uma parceira AWS que desenvolve soluções para mais de 800 prefeituras no Brasil. Em 2019 ela começou a oferecer às secretarias municipais de educação de 20 municípios a capacidade de usar o aprendizado de maquina (ML) para prever evasão e reprovação escolar dos alunos do ensino fundamental. Nesta sessão, iremos mostrar como essa solução foi construída utilizando dados escolares históricos, para alimentar um algoritmo de previsão hospedado no Amazon Sagemaker. Ajudando na tomada de decisões proativamente. Finalmente, mostraremos os resultados obtidos e como essa solução pode ser expandida.
sessions.hiddenTags: __portuguese,aws glue,aws step functions,amazon simple storage service (amazon s3)

sessions.name: Amazon DocumentDB를 사용한 데이터베이스 스키마 유연성 향상하기
sessions.description: 유연한 스키마를 가진 로그 수집 서비스는 모바일 서비스와 같은 동적인 빅데이터 플랫폼에 매우 중요합니다. 이 세션에서는 삼성전자 무선사업부 빅데이터 플랫폼에서 관계형 데이터베이스로부터 MongoDB API와 호환되는 Amazon DocumentDB로 데이터베이스를 이전한 고객 사례 및 모범 사례를 공유합니다. 효율적인 인덱스 유지 관리, 스트리밍 아키텍처 및 사용자 지정 CloudWatch 지표를 통해 데이터베이스 응답 시간을 대폭 줄이고 새로운 기능을 위한 스키마 변경에 유연하게 대응하면서 비용을 절감한 방법을 소개합니다.

sessions.name: サントリーグループにおけるグローバル IT インフラ統合への道のり
sessions.description: サントリーグループでは、グローバルにおける M&A の加速とシナジーの創出を目指し、AWSを活用したグローバルITインフラ統合プロジェクトを推進しています。本セッションでは、本プロジェクトの概要、先行して実施した日本での移行プロジェクトの内容、具体的な取り組みのポイントと成果についてご紹介します。また、さらなる安定稼働や最新サービス活用に向けた今後の方向性についても併せてご紹介します。

sessions.name: 시계열 분석을 사용한 수요 예측 및 재고 관리 최적화 사례
sessions.description: 소매업을 포함한 많은 기업들은 기계 학습을 디지털 혁신을 위한 핵심 기술로 사용하는 것을 고려하고 있습니다. 이 세션에서는 소매 비즈니스 최적화를위한 수요 예측 및 재고 관리에 대한 시계열 분석에 Amazon Forecast 및 Amazon SageMaker를 사용하는 방법을 공유합니다. 이를 기반으로 국내 대형 유통 업체가 재고 서비스를 최적화 한 성공 사례를 공유합니다.

sessions.name: AWS Certified DevOps Engineer - Professional
sessions.description: Get a quick overview of how the AWS Certified DevOps Engineer - Professional certification validates your expertise in automating the testing and deployment of AWS infrastructure and applications.

sessions.name: RhythmCloud
sessions.description: RhythmCloud teaches people to play acoustic drums by having them follow the patterns provided by lit LEDs inside the drums, and it adds robotics to the teaching repertoire. Students can have a robotic teacher play a sequence that they repeat back and have evaluated for accuracy. Robotics are done through AWS IoT Core and AWS IoT Greengrass, as is the control of the LEDs and drum sensors. A UI is provided to the user via a serverless web application through Amazon S3, Amazon API Gateway, and AWS Lambda.
sessions.hiddenTags: __builders_fair,__media___entertainment,builders fair,aws iot core,aws iot greengrass,aws lambda,education,__iot,english

sessions.name: AWS DeepRacer TV News October: Road to re:Invent
sessions.description: The 2020 AWS DeepRacer League regular seasonjust wrapped, and our 98 competitors are headed to the championships for shot at the AWS DeepRacer Cup. Tune in for who to watch as the league unfolds, and details for how YOU can get rolling with DeepRacer at re:Invent this year.

sessions.name: AWS Certification
sessions.description: Get a quick overview of how AWS Certification builds your credibility and confidence by validating your cloud skills with an industry-recognized credential. Explore role-based certifications and Specialty certifications.

sessions.name: Exam Readiness: AWS Certified Machine Learning - Specialty
sessions.description: Join us for this 3-hour, on-demand exam readiness session. An AWS trainer will walk you through the AWS Certified Machine Learning - Specialty exam structure. Focus your preparation by exploring the exam’s topic areas and identifying areas to study.

sessions.name: Creating a game development pipeline on AWS
sessions.description: COVID-19 has many game developers asking themselves if it’s possible to successfully develop games without returning to a studio. Come listen to Denis Dyack discuss Apocalypse Studio’s cloud-first approach and explore the components of its game development pipeline, built completely on AWS. Learn how to leverage AWS game tech services, like Amazon Lumberyard and Amazon GameLift, while using AWS Lambda, Amazon S3, and high-powered G4 instances to power a remote workstation, creating a game development pipeline that runs without requiring the return to a studio.

sessions.name: Nestlé brings supply chain transparency with Amazon Managed Blockchain
sessions.description: Chain of origin is the Nestlé answer to complete supply chain transparency, from crop to coffee cup, with technology at its heart. Today, consumers want to know about the quality of their product and know where it is sourced from. Using AWS and Amazon Managed Blockchain, Nestlé can store supply chain transactions in ways that are transparent, immutable, and verifiable to allow its partners to interact in a trustworthy and efficient manner. This solution also ensures that the supply chain is verified and any mistakes, malpractices, or tampering is quickly addressed.

sessions.name: Building a connected factory with Volkswagen
sessions.description: AWS and Volkswagen embarked on a multi-year collaboration to build the Digital Production Platform, enabling the transformation of the automotive company’s manufacturing and logistics processes. In this session, you learn how Volkswagen used the breadth and depth of the AWS portfolio of services, including AWS IoT, machine learning, and analytics, to unlock insights and accelerate business value through new use cases and digital solutions.
sessions.hiddenTags: __connected_world,__iot,__manufacturing,connected world,aws iot sitewise,aws iot greengrass,aws iot core,__automotive,english

sessions.name: Amazon Connect: 0 to AI-Powered Contact Center in 60 Minutes
sessions.description: Join us for one hour to learn how to serve your customers with AI-powered experiences without a big team of developers. Use Amazon Connect to provide a customer experience powered by Amazon Lex, AWS Lambda, and Contact Lens for Amazon Connect.

sessions.name: AWS Training and Certification Partner Spotlight: Slalom Consulting
sessions.description: Get a quick overview of how Slalom Consulting, a Premier AWS Consulting Partner, helped over 1,200 employees get AWS Certified to grow their careers and meet their clients' needs.

sessions.name: Using Open Distro for Elasticsearch for developer analytics
sessions.description: Join AWS Data Hero Manrique Lopez as he showcases Cauldron.io, an open-source SaaS solution built on Open Distro for Elasticsearch. He walks you through an introduction of Cauldron.io and its Elasticsearch and Kibana dependencies, and he explains why it is critical to have a full open-source distribution of both Elasticsearch and Kibana that developers can rely on. This talk also dives deep into which Open Distro for Elasticsearch features are available for Cauldron.io users.

sessions.name: Learn how Daniel and Jenny launched cloud careers at Hive
sessions.description: Get a quick overview of how Daniel went from a military musician to a Site Reliability Engineer and how Jenny went from a qualified lawyer and secretary to working in Information Security at Hive Home.

sessions.name: Meet some AWS re/Start graduates and employers - Casey and Chris
sessions.description: Get a quick overview of how Casey and Chris launched their careers with Direct Line Group and Securestorm with the help of AWS re/Start.

sessions.name: Défenses actives et passives automatisées
sessions.description: Concilier sécurité et agilité est un des défis les plus importants aujourd'hui. Lors de cette session, nous verrons comment mettre en pratique une approche DevSecOps pour mieux protéger et être pret en cas d'incident de sécurité sans imposer de contraintes sur l'architecture et les applications.

sessions.name: Come progettare una data platform per l'analisi delle immagini (caso d'uso: Bracco)
sessions.description: In questa sessione presenteremo i servizi e le soluzioni per implementare workload di analisi dei dati. Bracco racconterà l’esperienza maturata nell’ambito dell’imaging diagnostico. In particolare vedremo come Bracco ha utilizzato i servizi AWS per realizzare una piattaforma serverless che, a partire dalla raccolta delle immagini, permette di creare, addestrare e distribuire modelli di machine learning per analizzare le immagini archiviate.

sessions.name: Progettare applicazioni intelligenti con i servizi di IA (caso d'uso: Il Sole 24 Ore)
sessions.description: Con i servizi di intelligenza artificiale è possibile integrare funzionalità intelligenti senza avere conoscenze in ambito Machine Learning, semplicemente iniziando ad utilizzarli inserendo i tuoi dati o poche linee di codice. In questa sessione approfondiremo alcuni dei servizi di IA e vedremo come Il Sole 24 Ore ha integrato Amazon Transcribe nella loro pipeline audio.

sessions.name: La conformità dei dati nel cloud in ambito bancario (caso d'uso: Banca Progetto)
sessions.description: Come è possibile coniugare compliance e sicurezza con innovazione, velocità ed espansione globale del business? In questa sessione vedremo come Banca Progetto ha migrato la propria infrastruttura nel cloud, modernizzando applicazioni e business. In particolare ci soffermeremo sui vantaggi nella scelta di AWS per rispondere alle esigenze di compliance e sicurezza imposti dal regolamentatore e come AWS ha supportato la banca durante il suo processo di adozione del cloud.
sessions.hiddenTags: __italian,security compliance and identity,aws artifact,amazon sagemaker,amazon rekognition

sessions.name: 一気に学ぶ！AWSでの最適なデータベースの選び方
sessions.description: 迅速なイノベーションを実現するには、用途に合わせたデータベースの選択が重要です。AWS では現在、リレーショナルデータベースだけでなく、Key-Value、ドキュメント、インメモリ、グラフ、時系列、台帳データベースを含む専用データベースサービスから、目的にあったデータベースをお選びいただけます。本セッションでは AWS が提供するデータベースサービスの概要と使い分けのポイントをお伝えいたします。

sessions.name: Mapeando PII (Informação pessoalmente identificável): Encontrando dados pessoais em múltiplas fontes
sessions.description: LGPD, GDPR e outras leis de privacidade de dados surgiram após sucessivos incidentes de vazamento de informações. O acúmulo de dados pessoais deu poderes às empresas através de analytics, mas os riscos desse modelo exigiram novas regras. Nesta sessão falamos de um pipeline de mapeamento de dados pessoais, estendendo as capacidades nativas do Amazon Macie, como forma de dar o primeiro passo para a conformidade.
sessions.hiddenTags: __portuguese,security compliance and identity,amazon macie,aws glue,amazon kinesis

sessions.name: AWS “para computação na borda”
sessions.description: A cada ano mais clientes adotam computação em nuvem como parte de sua agenda de transformação digital, no entanto, parte da infraestrutura precisa permanecer local, por diversos fatores, como por exemplo latência. Nessa sessão, você conhecerá o portfólio de soluções da AWS para computação na borda (Edge) e como nossos clientes se beneficiam do uso da Cloud integrando e gerenciando recursos para computação na borda em cenários como de Internet das Coisas, Robotização, Telecom e Indústria.

sessions.name: Crea un sistema de detección y notificación sobre claves de acceso a rotar
sessions.description: A medida que las empresas crecen, se puede perder visibilidad sobre la implementación de medidas de seguridad. La rotación frecuente de claves de acceso es una de estas medidas que se suele pasar por alto. En esta sesión presentamos un sistema de notificación basado en AWS Config, que descubre aquellas que tienen que ser rotadas, generando notificaciones vía email o a sistemas como Jira y Slack.
sessions.hiddenTags: __spanish,aws config,aws key management service (aws kms),aws systems manager

sessions.name: Closing the digital divide with accessible technology
sessions.description: Tech inclusion involves considering the needs of the widest number of people across age, race, gender, and other classifications in the design of tech products, services, and virtual experiences. Join Michael Jackson, public health and US elections leader at AWS; Angelina Howard, senior product manager at Amazon and president of the Amazon Black Employee Network; and Nichelle Saunders, strategic advisor at AFROPUNK, to learn about the importance of tech accessibility.

sessions.name: Automated corrosion detection using machine learning
sessions.description: Visual inspection of industrial environments is a common requirement across heavy industries, and as a result, experts often have to perform manual inspections in adverse environments that put them at risk. Many of these industries deal with huge metal surfaces that are subject to corrosion, which poses a serious risk and huge financial impact. This demonstration showcases a machine learning approach to corrosion detection that helps visualize corroded areas. Learn how AWS Step Functions is used to create Amazon SageMaker machine learning models and deploy them for inference within a web application built with AWS Amplify and Amazon CloudFront.
sessions.tags: Artificial Intelligence & Machine Learning,Serverless,Front-End Web & Mobile Development,Demo

sessions.name: Boost serverless app performance with Amazon RDS Proxy & Amazon Aurora
sessions.description: When building serverless applications with relational databases, it is challenging to guarantee a scalable, secure, and highly available application. This session shows you how to overcome these challenges by leveraging a serverless architecture built using AWS Lambda, Amazon RDS Proxy, and Amazon Aurora MySQL. It walks you through implementation and best practices for connection management, failover, and scaling. Come dive deep on this topic with AWS Community Builder Carlos Zambrano Barrera.

sessions.name: You’re a machine learning rock star with AWS DeepComposer
sessions.description: AWS DeepComposer is a machine-learning-enabled keyboard that allows you to explore the complexities of generative adversarial networks (GANs) in a fun, interactive, and hands-on way. In this talk, develop machine learning skills (and maybe score your first recording contract) by using generative AI and AWS DeepComposer to compose a unique music track. Learn about music composition and the power of machine learning to create something new. By the end of the talk, you’ll be a machine learning rock star!

sessions.name: Exam Readiness: AWS Certified Data Analytics - Specialty
sessions.description: Join us for this 4-hour, on-demand exam readiness session. An AWS trainer will guide you through the AWS Certified Data Analytics - Specialty exam structure. Explore the exam’s topic areas and identify areas to study.

sessions.name: AWS PartnerCast – Introduction to Honeycode - Business
sessions.description: Learn more about Amazon Honeycode, a fully managed service that enables business users to build powerful mobile and web applications. Learn how to get started, available resources, and how to help customers solve their productivity challenges.

sessions.name: Building with Purpose-Built Databases for AWS Partners
sessions.description: Join us for one hour to learn about AWS databases that are purpose-built for your application use cases. Learn how to select different database services to solve different aspects of an application, and watch a demonstration about data services.

sessions.name: The Remote Workforce: Amazon Workspaces and Amazon Connect for AWS Partners
sessions.description: Join us for one hour to learn why remote support professionals need a centrally managed VDI solution with a Contact Center Solution. You'll explore how to leverage Amazon Workspace and Contact center to meet these requirements.

sessions.name: Add a custom domain to your AWS Amplify-hosted web application
sessions.description: Come learn how to add a custom domain to a web application built using AWS Amplify.
sessions.tags: Front-End Web & Mobile Development,Networking & Content Delivery,Lightning Talk

sessions.name: Améliorer la sécurité de votre cluster EKS grâce aux groupes de sécurités par pod
sessions.description: Les groupes de sécurité, agissant en tant que pare-feu virtuel pour vos l'instances, sont parmi les concepts plus importants et les plus couramment utilisés lors des déploiements sur AWS. L'intégration des groupes de sécurité aux pods dans Kubernetes était, d’ailleurs, l’une des fonctionnalités les plus demandée pour Amazon EKS. Dans cette présentation, nous abordons les cas d'utilisation des groupes de sécurité aux pods et terminerons par un tutoriel.

sessions.name: Faire plus avec moins de code en Serverless
sessions.description: De nombreuses pratiques de l'ingénierie logicielle peuvent et devraient être appliquées au développement de fonctions Lambda: Single Responsibility Principle (SOLID), You Ain't Gonna Need It (YAGNI), Keep It Simply Stupid (KISS). Durant cette session, vous découvrirez les différentes façons d'appliquer ces principes en tirant partie des services Serverless AWS, et avec le minimum de code, parfois même sans Lambda.

sessions.name: Estrategias de despliegue continuo en AWS
sessions.description: Los pipelines automáticos de integración y despliegue continuos (CI/CD) son un mecanismo para reducir el time-to-market, disminuir el número de defectos de tus aplicaciones y, en general, incrementar la calidad de tus productos. Además, como los pipelines de CI/CD permiten desplegar frecuentemente y sin downtime, el equipo de desarrollo puede lanzar cambios de software con confianza, e invertir menos tiempo respondiendo a caídas de servicio. En esta sesión exploraremos cómo usar las Developer Tools de AWS para llevar a cabo técnicas de despliegue avanzadas a distintos backends como instancias de Amazon EC2, clusters de Amazon ECS y funciones de AWS Lambda. Además, nos apoyaremos en demos para ilustrar las mismas de manera visual.

sessions.name: 서버리스 기반 인공 지능 서비스를 이용한 무인 스마트 매장 구현하기
sessions.description: 현대백화점그룹은 고품격 백화점부터 아울렛 그리고 면세점까지 다양한 오프라인 리테일 채널을 통해 쇼핑 문화를 선도하고 있습니다. 향후 미래형 무인 스마트 매장을 오픈하여 고객들에게 새로운 쇼핑 경험을 제공할 예정입니다. 이 세션에서는 AWS 프로토타이핑팀과 함께 AWS의 인공지능 서비스와 서버리스 서비스들을 활용하여 빠르고 효과적으로 무인 스마트 매장을 구현한 사례를 소개합니다.

sessions.name: Infrastructure as Code: alternative e benefici pratici (caso d'uso: Docebo)
sessions.description: In questa sessione parleremo di quali possano essere i benefici legati all’adozione di un approccio di Infrastructure as Code e di come questo permetta di automatizzare l’intero processo di creazione delle risorse AWS necessarie alla vostra applicazione. Approfondiremo anche l’esperienza di Docebo, condividendo perché hanno scelto di utilizzare Terraform e AWS Cloud Development Kit (AWS CDK).

sessions.name: Connecting communities through digital storytelling
sessions.description: Roshni Mahtani, founder of Tickled Media, has built her entire career on empowering women across Asia by building a lineup of omnichannel brands that deliver multimedia, hyperlocal content to more than 12 million women in eleven Asian countries every month. Roshni shares what a founder like herself can do to enable more communities across the world through digital platforms.

sessions.name: Make the leap! How wefox switched over to AWS
sessions.description: When wefox Group began to scale, CTO Sergi Baños knew it was necessary to evaluate how the company’s infrastructure should be built to uphold their long-term vision of data security. Learn how wefox Group made the switch to AWS and how it’s using Amazon ElastiCache, Amazon RDS, Amazon SQS, Amazon EKS, and more to achieve a 3x application throughput versus its previous setup.

sessions.name: AWS Certified Advanced Networking - Specialty
sessions.description: Get a quick overview of how the AWS Certified Advanced Networking - Specialty certification validates your ability to design and maintain network architecture for the breadth of AWS services.

sessions.name: How CATCH FASHION built a serverless ML inference service with AWS Lambda
sessions.description: Deploying machine learning (ML) models for services in production can be challenging. And doing so using serverless feels really new for many people. This session walks you through a real-world example of how CATCH FASHION deployed fashion image analysis using ML and serverless and how it used TensorFlow.js. It also covers the lessons that the team learned along the way.
sessions.tags: Artificial Intelligence & Machine Learning,Serverless,Open Source,Dev Chat

sessions.name: What is AWS?
sessions.description: Amazon Web Services (AWS) is the world’s most comprehensive and broadly adopted cloud platform, offering over 175 fully featured services from data centers globally. See why millions of customers trust AWS to run their businesses and applications.

sessions.name: Friendship is the key to girls cracking code
sessions.description: Since its inception in 2014, Girl Geek Academy has taught coding and technology lessons to over 10,000 women and girls. Through hackathons, game jams, forums, online workshops, and industry partnerships, Sarah Moran, cofounder of Girl Geek Academy, is building a future where women have a bigger say in how the internet works. Join Moran as she talks about the role that friendship plays in the successful retention of women and girls in STEM.

sessions.name: AWS Certification Explainer: Exam Guides
sessions.description: If you are preparing for an AWS Certification exam, have you reviewed the exam guide? Set yourself up for success by learning how to read an exam guide and why it's important.

sessions.name: Building robots to help hospitals become safer and smarter
sessions.description: In hospitals and other healthcare venues, robots increasingly perform contactless delivery and autonomous maintenance services to reduce the risk of exposing patients and medical staff to harmful viruses and bacteria. In this session, see how Solaris JetBrain and Milvus Robotics develop and deploy robots quickly and safely for hospitals with open-source tools and AWS. Learn how Solaris JetBrain tests their robots in an AWS RoboMaker simulation to improve safety and find edge cases before deploying applications to physical robots.

sessions.name: 在云端运行你的Tiny ML 推理
sessions.description: TinyML 是一个快速增长的机器学习技术和应用的方向。通常我们是在边缘侧或者低功耗的微处理器实现这一类机器学习的推理，并由此而产生了一系列与此相对应的工具与技术，例如Tensorflow Lite、OpenVino 、OpenCV以及Darknet 等。在这个演讲中，我们讲探讨如何利用这些高效推理的技术，利用AWS Lambda 作为推理的平台而将TinyML 运行在云端。这种实现的方式对于需要简单部署、高效推理的场景来说尤为有效。

sessions.name: Trip.com 通过AWS Media系列构建全球直播平台
sessions.description: 作为全球第三大OTA厂商，Trip.com 通过与AWS合作，构建全球的直播平台帮助全球旅游业恢复.通过AWS 遍布全球的服务及稳定基础设施，Trip.com可以将大型的Event直播，就近转码并分发到各个平台和Trip.com应用，为全球所有用户提供最新的旅游资讯。同时按需使用的方式，让Trip.com 以更加低成本的开销，积极尝试东南亚市场，快速形成更具规模的直播效应

sessions.name: 汇量科技基于 AWS 构建日均千亿次预测的一站式机器学习平台
sessions.description: Mobvisa汇量科技是全球领先的移动营销平台，每天需要通过复杂的算法预测获得超过1000亿个广告请求，这一需求的背后，是每天数十个PB的数据处理规模、每小时数十亿个特征规模的模型训练，以及每天数万次的分析和模型训练工作。这对解决方案的高存储吞吐量与弹性要求，达到近乎严苛的地步。如何满足高吞吐量、高弹性的同时，实现成本上的优化与节省，是面临的首要挑战。

sessions.name: API moderne per applicazioni web e mobile in tempo reale (caso d'uso: Sky Italia)
sessions.description: Con l'ascesa delle architetture di microservizi e delle applicazioni mobili e Web, le API sono più importanti che mai per offrire agli utenti finali una user experience di alto livello. In questa sessione impareremo come affrontare le moderne sfide di progettazione delle API con GraphQL e come utilizzare AWS AppSync, un servizio GraphQL serverless gestito su AWS. Valuteremo diversi scenari e, in particolare, approfondiremo come un nostro cliente nel settore dei media, Sky Italia, utilizza AWS AppSync per fornire dati ed aggiornamenti sportivi in tempo reale alla propria applicazione web.

sessions.name: Enterprise MLOps: Machine Learning da sperimentazione a produzione (caso d’uso: Enel)
sessions.description: Flessibilità e agilità, ma allo stesso tempo sicurezza e governance sono solo alcuni dei principi di base per standardizzare e industrializzare lo sviluppo di modelli di Machine Learning in un contesto enterprise. In questa sessione approfondiremo come implementare processi MLOps su AWS condividendo l’architettura della ML Factory di Enel, una piattaforma globale su cui ospitare iniziative AI/ML, e il caso del progetto ODIN (Object Detection at Infrastructure & Network).

sessions.name: Detecta patrones complejos sobre flujos de datos en tiempo real
sessions.description: Responder en tiempo real a los datos de tu organización abre posibilidades para analítica, seguridad, e incluso para escenarios avanzados como mejora de la satisfacción de tus clientes o detección de fraude. Debido a las dificultades del procesamiento de flujos de datos continuos, solemos usar analítica en tiempo real solo para transformaciones simples y métricas agregadas, relegando la analítica más interesante para los procesos batch. En esta sesión te cuento cómo Amazon Kinesis Data Analytics For Apache Flink permite analizar eventos complejos a gran escala sobre un flujo continuo de datos (un clickstream) obteniendo resultados en segundos.

sessions.name: 대용량 자바 애플리케이션 클라우드 네이티브 아키텍처 적용기
sessions.description: Samsung Account는 10억 개 이상의 계정과 2억 명의 활성 사용자를 가지고 있으며, 2018년에 주요 서비스 중단을 경험한 이후 클라우드 네이티브 엔터프라이즈 자바 애플리케이션으로 마이그레이션했습니다. 이 세션에서는 엔터프라이즈 자바 애플리케이션을 클라우드 네이티브 아키텍처로 변경하는 동안 테스트 하고 공부했던 다양한 경험들을 4가지의 단계로 나눠서 1)도커라이징 2) DevOps 오케스트레이션 3) 네트워크, 로드 밸런싱 4) 카오스 엔지니어링 항목으로 설명합니다.
sessions.hiddenTags: __korean,amazon elastic kubernetes service,aws cloud development kit

sessions.name: Empowering formerly incarcerated citizens through code
sessions.description: Through a partnership with Columbia University, Justice Through Code (JTC) offers life-changing access to career-track opportunities in the technology industry to people impacted by the mass incarceration crisis. JTC seeks to tackle mass incarceration by addressing two of the most significant contributors to recidivism: a lack of job training and the subsequently high rates of unemployment for the formerly incarcerated. Come learn how JTC aims to equip participants with the requisite skills to embark on a sustainable career in the tech industry.

sessions.name: Connected Factory Solution drives Industry 4.0 success
sessions.description: Data from the manufacturing plant floor is often untapped because it’s locked into on-premises devices, machines, or historian databases. In this demo, learn how to use the AWS IoT Connected Factory Solution to unlock data from industrial equipment and optimize operations, improve productivity, and increase asset availability.
sessions.hiddenTags: __connected_world,__iot,__manufacturing,connected world,aws iot sitewise,aws iot greengrass,oil & gas,english

sessions.name: AWS Certified SysOps Administrator - Associate
sessions.description: Get a quick overview of how the AWS Certified SysOps Administrator - Associate certification validates your ability to operate systems on the AWS platform and migrate on-premises workloads to the AWS Cloud.

sessions.name: AWS Certified Developer - Associate
sessions.description: Get a quick overview of how the AWS Certified Developer - Associate certification validates your ability to write and deploy cloud-based applications that follow AWS best practices.

sessions.name: AWS Certified Cloud Practitioner
sessions.description: Get a quick overview of how the AWS Certified Cloud Practitioner certification builds your confidence and credibility by validating your cloud fluency and foundational AWS knowledge.

sessions.name: How Amazon SageMaker can help
sessions.description: Learn how Amazon SageMaker mitigates the core challenges of implementing a machine learning pipeline. You'll review key SageMaker features and discover how SageMaker notebooks and instances help power your machine learning workloads.

sessions.name: Skydio: Scaling autonomous flight for enterprise with AWS
sessions.description: Skydio is a world leader in drone autonomy, but this is just a building block for scaling drones as an enterprise edge computing service. Central to this vision is an integrated, highly available, secure cloud service stack for managing the fleet in real time, gathering and analyzing data at a large scale, and automating enterprise workflows. In this session, learn how Skydio is using AWS to enable rapid development of disconnected intelligent systems. AWS services like Amazon Kinesis and Amazon S3 enable Skydio’s high-throughput data ingestion and processing. Finally, learn how AWS built-in security and control help provide a secure foundation for enterprise users.

sessions.name: Exam Readiness: AWS Certified Cloud Practitioner
sessions.description: Join us for this 1-hour, on-demand exam readiness session. An AWS trainer will guide you through the AWS Certified Cloud Practitioner exam structure. Explore the exam’s topic areas and identify areas to study.

sessions.name: Build a web application and query stored data
sessions.description: Learn how to create a simple React web application with AWS Amplify and easily query stored data using the GraphQL API.

sessions.name: AWS PartnerCast - AWS での Active Directory デザインパターンとベストプラクティス – Technical
sessions.description: Microsoftワークロードでは、認証と認可の機能を提供するためにActive Directoryが重要になります。 企業がワークロードをクラウドに移行するとき、同じ認証と認可の戦略を拡張または保持し、クラウド上でも同様に提供する強力な戦略を持つことが重要です。 このセッションでは、AWS上に移行またはセットアップされるActive Directory設計パターンについて説明し、AWSリソースを管理する方法についても解説します。

sessions.name: Amazon Elastic Kubernetes Service (EKS) Primer
sessions.description: Join us for one hour to discover the basics of the Amazon Elastic Kubernetes Service (EKS). You'll learn how to implement containers on AWS using EKS and complementary services, and how communications and management are performed in EKS.

sessions.name: Getting Started with the AWS Cloud Essentials
sessions.description: Join us for one hour to learn about the AWS Cloud and AWS services in the Compute, Storage, Database, Networking, and Security categories. You'll gain a basic understanding of the cloud and key terminology to help advance your cloud skills.

sessions.name: AWS 주요 인프라 서비스 현황
sessions.description: AWS 글로벌 클라우드 인프라는 가장 안전하고 광범위하며 안정적인 클라우드 플랫폼으로 175 개 이상의 광범위한 서비스를 제공합니다. 이 세션에서는 올해 AWS 인프라 서비스 전반에서 출시한 새로운 서비스와 기능과 함께 지속적인 혁신을 통해 네트워킹, 컴퓨팅 성능의 지속적인 발전에 대한 방향성을 살펴봅니다. 개발자부터 대기업, 스타트업에 이르기까지 모든 고객이 보안과 안정성을 높이면서도 유연성과 성능을 높이는 데 도움이 되는 방법을 소개합니다.

sessions.name: Machine Learning Basics
sessions.description: Learn what machine learning is and how it can solve your business problems. You'll get an overview of the key concepts, terminology, and processes in the exciting field of machine learning!

sessions.name: Strategies and Tools to Perform Large-Scale Migrations
sessions.description: Join us for one hour to learn about AWS strategies and best practices for performing large-scale migrations. You'll also review proven techniques for successful migrations and explore tools that accelerate your migration to the AWS Cloud.

sessions.name: Smart recycle kit
sessions.description: Do you ever have trouble identifying which items go into the recycle bin and which go into the garbage bin? Look no further than The Recycle Kit. This kit can differentiate between recyclable and nonrecyclable items, and it provides a visual indicator displaying red for trash and green for recycle. When it finds an item with low confidence, it displays yellow. This kit contains all the elements you need to build this solution at home. You also have an opportunity to compete in a virtual recycling competition.
sessions.hiddenTags: __builders_fair,__artificial_intelligence___machine_learning,builders fair,amazon sagemaker,aws iot core,general public services,sustainability,english

sessions.name: AWSではじめるデータレイク　〜AWSのデータレイク関連サービス概要〜
sessions.description: AWSでデータ活用を始めてみませんか。データウェアハウスやログ分析、機械学習といった進化する分析環境に柔軟に対応する「データレイク」は今やデータ活用に欠かせないものとなりました。本セッションでは、AWS上で構築するデータレイク概要とその周辺サービスについてご紹介します。
sessions.hiddenTags: __japanese,amazon redshift,amazon simple storage service (amazon s3),amazon athena

sessions.name: Exam Readiness: AWS Certified SysOps Administrator - Associate
sessions.description: Join us for this 3-hour, on-demand exam readiness session. An AWS trainer will walk you through the AWS Certified SysOps Administrator - Associate exam structure. Focus your preparation by exploring the exam’s topic areas and identifying areas to study.

sessions.name: AWS Certified Solutions Architect - Professional
sessions.description: Get a quick overview of how the AWS Certified Solutions Architect - Professional certification validates your expertise with the breadth of AWS services and how they best work together within diverse, complex requirements.

sessions.name: Dynamic codebreaking in the cloud with machine vision and IoT
sessions.description: Put a cloud-native spin on the classic Mastermind game from the 1970s. Using AWS DeepLens, OpenCV, AWS IoT Core, Amazon DynamoDB, and Amazon QuickSight, users attempt to dynamically break a randomly generated code of a set of four multicolored sticky notes. As the notes are moved in real time to new sequences, AWS DeepLens transforms the captured video into data that is then evaluated and presented back from the AWS Cloud with a notification of how close the user is to breaking the visual code.

sessions.name: Get Started on your AWS Partner Learning Journey
sessions.description: Get a quick overview of what type of partner training will work best for you. Determine your learning path and get started on your cloud journey.

sessions.name: 15 things I wish I knew about securing my AWS account
sessions.description: Join this chat for 15 practical cloud security tips that you can implement today. At the end of the talk, you are given resources such as a security checklist and accompanying how-to videos to help you implement all 15 tips. Come learn about MFA with YubiKeys, rotating access keys, Region restriction, inventory via AWS Config, AWS Security Hub, permissions boundaries, AWS accounts for isolation, and more.

sessions.name: AWS Virtual Classroom Training
sessions.description: Get a quick overview of why AWS Virtual Classroom Training is an efficient and effective way for you and your team to gain in-demand cloud skills from a live, expert AWS instructor without having to travel.

sessions.name: Success: Business Innovation and Eliminating the Skills Gap
sessions.description: Learn why you need the right skilled talent for a successful cloud transformation. Michael Fagan, CTO of Kmart/Target Australia, shares how training all employees on the cloud can increase efficiency and business innovation.

sessions.name: AWS Tech U: Dakota talks building an AWS Technical Career
sessions.description: Get a quick overview of how AWS Tech U helped Dakota start his career as a Solutions Architect in AWS.

sessions.name: See how Modus launched its new business on the AWS Cloud
sessions.description: Modus provides technology services to corporate law departments and law firms and was getting ready to launch a new business line called Modus Agile. Learn how the company collaborated with AWS to scale its business and improve top-line growth.
sessions.hiddenTags: __getting_started_lounge,__compute,getting started lounge,amazon elastic compute cloud (amazon ec2),justice and public safety,__global_partner_summit__gps_,english

sessions.name: 12 Days of re:Invent with A Cloud Guru
sessions.description: On the 1st day of re:Invent, A Cloud Guru gave to me …? Check into the ACG booth M-Th of each week for limited-edition swag, plus we TL;DR all the new announcements. ‘Tis the season for cloud learning!

sessions.name: Scaling sustainable community development with tech
sessions.description: We can change the system of “doing good” by enabling the people in the communities where the problems exist with the tools, technologies, and self-efficacy to own their solutions. Join AWS Heroes and Further Impact to discuss how social entrepreneurs are using tech for good to create more livable and equitable communities.

sessions.name: Build Your Roadmap for Cloud Financial Management Success
sessions.description: Learn the six capabilities essential to your organization’s Cloud Financial Management journey and how to assess your maturity against those capabilities to build your organization’s roadmap.

sessions.name: Modelling and provisioning apps with AWS CDK
sessions.description: Join us for one hour to discover how the AWS Cloud Development Kit (CDK) helps you use your preferred programming language to define your apps and infrastructure. Learn to create CDK constructs for consistency and simplicity when deploying apps.

sessions.name: Jason Tam of eCloudvalley on hiring AWS Academy graduates
sessions.description: Get a quick overview as Jason Tam of eCloudvalley in Taiwan explains why employers should hire AWS Academy graduates

sessions.name: 行者AI，为游戏插上人工智能的翅膀
sessions.description: 行者AI（成都潜在人工智能科技有限公司）专注于人工智能在游戏领域的研究和应用，凭借自研算法，推出游戏AI、音乐AI，内容审核、AI自动化测试、以及数据平台等解决方案。目前在游戏行业内，已经做到全栈的AI解决方案。

sessions.name: 华米基于AWS构建全球云上健康服务
sessions.description: 华米科技是全球TOP5的智能可穿戴设备制造商，在全球拥有近1亿用户，如何为用户提供安全，稳定，高效的服务，是华米技术团队一直在思考的问题，利用AWS全球资源的能力，以及云原生的架构，在统一技术栈的前提下，华米基于ECS,DynamoDB,Aurora,WAF等产品实现了高效部署安全,稳定的云上健康服务的目标。随着国内迁移的结束，All-in AWS更是华米对AWS的信任。

sessions.name: 亿级物联网设备网关在Graviton2机型实践
sessions.description: 涂鸦智能是一个全球化智能平台, “AI+IoT”开发者平台, 为客户提供一站式人工智能物联网的解决方案, 为消费类IoT智能设备提供B端技术及商业模式升级服务, 从而满足消费者对硬件产品更高的诉求。截至2019年10月底，涂鸦智能已经服务全球超18万家平台客户，其中欧美非地区占比超五成以上，日语音 AI 交互超 4000 万次，创造完全中立的 “AI+IoT”产品赋能模式。Powered by Tuya赋能超 9 万款产品，赋能产品种数达到500种，产品和服务覆盖超过220个国家和地区。本次演讲介绍涂鸦如何基于更具性价比的AWS Graviton实例构建支持并发千万级设备连接的IoT网关。

sessions.name: 文远知行Robotaxi开放运营背后的数据力量
sessions.description: 文远知行是一家拥有中国领先L4级自动驾驶技术的智能出行公司，是中国首家得到全球汽车制造商投资的L4级自动驾驶初创企业，也是中国第一家获准开展全无人驾驶路测的自动驾驶公司。截至2020年9月底，文远知行无人驾驶车队规模超100辆，自动驾驶总里程超过300万公里，Robotaxi全对外开放运营超过300天，接待乘客超过100,000人次，无任何主动责任事故。本次演讲介绍文远知行如何利用AWS构建自动驾驶整体方案并利用PB级数据支撑技术创新。
sessions.hiddenTags: __chinese,amazon simple storage service (amazon s3),amazon elastic compute cloud (amazon ec2),aws iot core

sessions.name: Come ideare servizi innovativi basati su interfacce vocali (caso d'uso: Iveco)
sessions.description: In questa sessione racconteremo il percorso di IVECO, non solo dal punto di vista tecnologico ma anche attraverso un'ottica di innovazione. Tramite il Digital innovation program di AWS, Iveco ha sviluppato servizi innovativi per i truck driver basati su interfacce vocali sviluppati con Amazon Alexa. La sessione includerà anche un deep dive tecnologico sui servizi e sulle soluzioni che hanno abilitato questa customer experience grazie al supporto del team professional services di AWS.

sessions.name: AWSの機械学習サービスで広がる世界
sessions.description: AWSが提供する、画像分析やテキスト分析をはじめとした機械学習サービスをご紹介します。API をたたくだけで簡単に使えるものから、ご自分で機械学習モデルを開発する際に便利にご利用いただけるサービスまで取りそろえています。「これ使ってみたい！」というサービスがいくつ見つかるでしょうか？

sessions.name: re:Invent2020 前の総復習！30分でわかる コンピュート/ストレージ 関連サービスの使い分け
sessions.description: AWSにはお客様の様々な要望に応えるため、非常に多種多様なサービス・機能がありますが、実際に使い始める際にどうやって適したものを選択したらよいか悩むこともあるのではないでしょうか。本セッションでは、特にAmazon EC2や各種ストレージサービスに着目し、EC2インスタンスタイプの選択方法や、ファイルサーバーやデータ移行といったユースケースに応じたストレージサービスの選択についてご紹介いたします。これからAWSを使い始める方だけでなく、適したインスタンスタイプの選択やマネージドサービスの活用によるコスト最適化、運用負荷の軽減を検討したい方も是非ご参加ください。
sessions.hiddenTags: __japanese,amazon elastic block store (amazon ebs),amazon elastic file system (amazon efs),amazon fsx for windows file server

sessions.name: 番組完成素材を一元的に管理するコンテンツ管理システムの構築
sessions.description: フジテレビでは、将来の新たな視聴サービスや増加し続けるコンテンツ送出先に柔軟に対応するため、従来のやり方から脱却し、最適化された放送設備・ワークフローの構築に取り組んできました。 S3とS3 Glacier、MediaConvertを活用した「総合コンテンツ管理システム」は、社内設備を最小限にしたシンプルな構成です。番組素材を一元的に管理する新しい「コンテンツレイク」として、放送用番組素材だけではなくインターネット動画配信や外部販売用の番組素材を扱うほか、アーカイブシステムも包括しています。
sessions.hiddenTags: __japanese,media solutions,amazon simple storage service (amazon s3),amazon s3 glacier,aws elemental mediaconvert

sessions.name: Desbloqueando dados do espaço para resolver desafios do planeta Terra
sessions.description: Os dados do espaço habilitam formas sem precedentes para monitorar, compreender e navegar nos dados em nosso planeta em constante mudança. Nesta sessão, apresentaremos toda a jornada do cliente. Demonstrando o pipeline de dados, incluindo a captura e o processamento de imagens geoespaciais usando AWS Ground Station, Sagemaker e Step Functions com base nas experiências de clientes na América Latina. A primeira parte desta apresentação será dedicada à AWS Ground Station, que permite que organizações públicas e privadas façam a ingestão de dados de satélites na AWS, permitindo acesso de baixa latência. A segunda parte da apresentação explorará os recursos de machine learning nas imagens de satélite extraindo insights de negócios endereçando desafios globais.

sessions.name: Construa Soluções Automatizadas de Previsão de Demanda Utilizando Inteligência Artificial
sessions.description: Soluções de Forecast tem função essencial no negócio e permitem que as organizações desenvolvam estratégias com base em dados históricos de demanda. A previsão da demanda futura pode ser fundamental para a execução de um negócio eficiente, pois ajuda a minimizar sobre e subprovisionamento, otimizando assim a lucratividade e aumentando a satisfação do cliente. A solução fornece um pipeline automatizado para gerar, testar e comparar modelos e previsões do Amazon Forecast, permitindo que desenvolvedores e cientistas de dados reduzam os custos gerais do desenvolvimento de novas previsões ou o tempo necessário para otimizar as existentes.

sessions.name: Predictive quality for industrial companies
sessions.description: Come learn how AWS IoT software and services enable industrial companies to build predictive quality models using data from all the devices in their industrial environments and third-party data inputs

sessions.name: AWS Certified Solutions Architect - Associate
sessions.description: Get a quick overview of how the AWS Certified Solutions Architect - Associate certification validates your ability to design and deploy well-architected solutions on AWS to meet specific customer requirements.

sessions.name: Securing your AWS Cloud
sessions.description: Join us for one hour to learn how AWS services can improve your security posture. You can also explore design principles that help you plan your security approach and access resources to build your AWS security knowledge.

sessions.name: Your Journey to a Cloud Career with AWS Educate
Understanding multi-account management
sessions.description: Join this session to learn about the evolution of the AWS account and the need for a multi-account strategy. Learn how to set up and use AWS Organizations, which helps you efficiently create and manage multiple AWS accounts with consolidated billing, centralized logging, security, and control policies. This session covers service control policies, reviews a sample multi-account strategy, and includes a discussion of other best practices when dealing with multiple accounts.

sessions.name: Sales Plays and Customer Conversations for AWS Partners
sessions.description: Learn three sales use cases to identify AWS Analytics opportunities for your organization, including messaging, compelling events, key stakeholders, qualifying questions, customer examples, and how to partner with AWS Sales.

sessions.name: School of Open Learning uses AWS Educate to train thousands of students
sessions.description: Get a quick overview of how the School of Open Learning in New Delhi, India, uses AWS Disaster Recovery tools to protect the data of nearly 450,000 students. The school uses AWS Educate to train disadvantaged students in cloud computing.

sessions.name: Introduction to Blockchain and Amazon Managed Blockchain
sessions.description: Learn about key blockchain concepts and real-world use cases. You'll also review the challenges of building blockchain networks from scratch and how Amazon Managed Blockchain can help you overcome those challenges.

sessions.name: charity: water and Twisthink keep water flowing with AWS IoT
sessions.description: charity: water is a nonprofit organization that provides clean water to rural communities in developing countries. The company needed a way to predict when hand pumps were going to break so that it could keep the water flowing for millions of people. Come learn how developing an IoT device that runs on AWS IoT and FreeRTOS enables charity: water to more efficiently and cost-effectively monitor the health of 7,300 water pumps in remote locations and dispatch service before a water source stops working.

sessions.name: JFEエンジニアリングにおけるインダストリアルIoT/MLの最新実装例 - AWSによるプラント操業高度化のはじまり-
sessions.description: JFEエンジニアリングでは、AWSを活用して、プラント向けデータ解析プラットフォーム（Pla'cello）を2018年11月に構築しました。AI関連の社内プロジェクトは70を超え、データを活用した業務改善・商品改善が日常的に行われています。本講演では、プラント制御とIT技術が連携する事例として、プラント内で動作するDCSとAWS IoT Greengrassを連携させ、エッジ側でAIを動作させた取り組みについてご紹介します。

sessions.name: La Evolución de un banco latino americano basada en una plataforma de datos moderna
sessions.description: En esta sesión, compartiremos cómo el holding financiero más grande de Colombia (Grupo Aval) a través de Aval Digital Labs (ADL) creó la Plataforma Augusta, una plataforma de datos integrada con más de 50 servicios de AWS. Compartiremos sus componentes de arquitectura, que soportan hoy modelos de detección de fraudes, donde 87% de los fraudes son detectados a través de Augusta. Su plataforma garantiza una experiencia totalmente digital a 90% clientes, al adquirir una tarjeta de crédito, mejorando 73% el proceso previo. También les compartiremos cómo cumplieron con los estándares de seguridad que exige el holding y la industria para manejar datos sensibles

sessions.name: 고객 비즈니스 성공을 위한 AWS 인공 지능 서비스 소개
sessions.description: 인공 지능과 기계 학습 (AI/ML)은 기업의 차별화를 만듭니다. AWS는 고객의 비즈니스의 다양한 측면에서 클라우드를 기반으로 새로운 AI/ML 기능을 구축 할 수 있도록 지원하고 있습니다. AWS를 이용하면 여러분은 기계 학습을 통해 데이터에서 더 쉽게 통찰력을 얻을 수 있습니다. 현재 AWS ML 서비스는 고객의 성공을 위해 계속 성장하고 있습니다. 이 세션에서는 다양한 AWS 최신 기계 학습 서비스, 고객의 가치를 위한 ML 서비스 개발 및 고객의 주요 모범 사례를 통해 지능형 비즈니스에 AWS를 채택한 방법을 소개합니다.

sessions.name: AWS 기반의 글로벌 스마트 플랜트 시스템 구축하기
sessions.description: 삼성엔지니어링은 EPC (Engineering, Procurement, Construction) 산업 내에서 세계적으로 인정받는 기업입니다. 이 세션에서는 AWS 글로벌 네트워크를 사용하는 EPC 설계 및 정보 관리 애플리케이션을 위한 스트리밍 플랫폼으로서 Amazon AppStream 2.0 활용 방안 및 아키텍처를 공유합니다. 최근 디지털 혁신을 위해 스마트 플랜트 시스템에서 생성된 모든 데이터를 AWS의 데이터 레이크(Data Lake) 기반으로 구성하는 프로젝트를 진행하고 있습니다.

sessions.name: Modernice aplicaciones JAVA y .NET usando contenedores. Introducción a AWS App2Container
sessions.description: En esta sesión mostraremos cómo modernizar una aplicación usando AWS App2Container, el cual puede apoyar a empaquetar aplicaciones legadas generando imagenes de contenedores para desplegarlas fácilmente usando Amazon ECS y Amazon EKS
sessions.hiddenTags: __spanish,amazon elastic container service (amazon ecs),amazon elastic kubernetes service

sessions.name: AWS PartnerCast - Built By AWS, Customized For AWS Partners - Learn about Your AWS Training Options
sessions.description: Join us for one hour to learn about training and certification resources exclusive to AWS Partners. You'll learn how to accelerate your cloud journey through free partner training, guided paths to certifications, promotional credits, and more.

sessions.name: AWS PartnerCast - 云生态中的销售体系转型 – Business
sessions.description: 销售转型是APN合作伙伴触达目标客户、识别并挖掘有效商机、推动商机建立、打消客户顾虑并加速赢单的核心工作。本活动详细介绍销售转型的目标与框架、流程实践与示例、甜点场景挖掘要点等，旨在帮助合作伙伴高效地制作出符合业务特点、操作规范的销售流程与话术手册，提升云业务销售的效率与价值。活动内容主要针对高级与精选级的合作伙伴，适合负责销售、售前、业务拓展、客户服务等工作的总监、主管与核心员工学习，对制定云业务转型战略也有参考价值。

sessions.name: How Airtable safely runs custom user scripts
sessions.description: Airtable Automations is a rules engine for creating triggers and actions that can send notifications, automate redundant tasks, and orchestrate work via integrations. Scripting allows Airtable users to take that one step further by extending and customizing what Airtable can do using the complete power of JavaScript. Learn how Airtable’s scripting environment works, how Airtable uses AWS Lambda and V8 Isolates to provide defense in depth and safely run untrusted code authored by users, and how Airtable makes sure that script authors have a smooth experience writing and running code for the platform.

sessions.name: What is AWS DeepRacer?
sessions.description: AWS DeepRacer is the fastest way to get rolling with machine learning. In this 90 second introduction, you'll learn what the AWS DeepRacer is, and how you can get started on your machine learning journey.

sessions.name: Exam Readiness: AWS Certified Security - Specialty
sessions.description: Join us for this 2-hour, on-demand exam readiness session. An AWS trainer will guide you through the AWS Certified Security - Specialty exam structure. Explore the exam’s topic areas and identify areas to study.

sessions.name: Transforming Your Business and Co-Selling with AWS for AWS Partners
sessions.description: Join us for one hour and learn how to pivot your business from traditional re-sell to the cloud. You'll also explore AWS roles that support a co-selling motion, how to explain your differentiation, and resources to help you.

sessions.name: AWS Educate student lands job as a DevOps engineer
sessions.description: Get a quick overview of Alfredo, who lost his job after Hurricane Maria. He joined AWS Educate to complete Cloud Career Pathways and landed a job as a DevOps Engineer at Universal Studios Orlando.

sessions.name: What’s New with EMR 6.0+ for AWS Partners
sessions.description: Join us for one hour to learn what’s new in the EMR 6.x+ series and how EMR can help you run petabyte-scale analysis at less than half the cost of on-premises solutions and over three times faster than standard Apache Spark.

sessions.name: Deployer SAP sur AWS
sessions.description: Découvrez un ensemble de directives, de stratégies et de décisions d'architecture pour les environnements SAP basés sur SAP NetWeaver pour une configuration hautement disponible et fiable sur AWS. Vous apprendrez différents modèles d'architecture et les critères clés pour vous aider à choisir la bonne architecture.

sessions.name: 基于SageMaker构建海外智能推荐平台
sessions.description: 如何快速的构建、训练和部署机器学习模型不仅是业务部门关注的重点，更是研发部门渴求的目标。通过使用Amazon SageMaker，OPPO在海外智能推荐和机器学习的业务场景中，完美的消除了各个过程中繁重的重复工作，让开发、训练、构建和部署高质量的模型变得更加的轻松和灵活。OPPO将分享在海外使用Amazon SageMaker优化智能推荐平台和模型的最佳实践经验。
sessions.hiddenTags: __chinese,software & internet,amazon sagemaker,amazon simple storage service (amazon s3)

sessions.name: 大宇无限100%AWS 容器化架构+100% AWS SPOT
sessions.description: 大宇无限Mobiuspace每月为超过一亿的全球用户提供移动视频推荐和内容服务，平台服务全面native云服务，实现100% ECS+EKS的微服务架构，且透过100% SPOT实例得到成本的最优化
sessions.hiddenTags: __chinese,design and engineering,amazon elastic container service (amazon ecs),amazon elastic kubernetes service

sessions.name: Como começar sua jornada (segura) na AWS
sessions.description: A nuvem permite inovar e entregar valor mais rápido. Nesta sessão iremos mostrar como os clientes podem começar a jornada na AWS de forma segura seja com uma ou múltiplas contas, abordar os desafios do crescimento e melhores práticas relacionadas a organização de contas e segurança, além dos principais serviços para prevenção, detecção e resposta a incidentes. Comece a implementar boas práticas no seu ambiente hoje mesmo obtendo vitórias rápidas em segurança!

sessions.name: Exam Readiness: AWS Certified Solutions Architect - Associate
sessions.description: Join us for this 3-hour, on-demand exam readiness session.  An AWS trainer will walk you through the AWS Certified Solutions Architect - Associate exam structure, including question formats, content domains, and the breakdown of questions across those domains. Focus your preparation by exploring the exam’s topic areas and identifying specific areas to study.

sessions.name: AWS Certification Digital Badges
sessions.description: Get a quick overview of why digital badges are a key benefit of getting AWS Certified. Learn about flexible options for recognition and verification to showcase your achievement.

sessions.name: Empowering entrepreneurs through eco-initiatives
sessions.description: The CEO and founder of Market Kurly (a fast-growing grocery delivery startup), Sophie Kim, is changing the landscape of Asia by empowering entrepreneurs, farmers, and suppliers to launch their businesses on Market Kurly. As a champion of eco-initiatives, Kim supports sustainability through Market Kurly’s products, with benefits reaching elementary schools. Learn more from Kim as she shares her story.

sessions.name: AWS Certification: Getting Started
sessions.description: Get a quick overview of how to start your AWS Certification journey. Just follow these tips to make a plan, get exam ready, and get AWS Certified.

sessions.name: AWS Tech U: Dave talks building an AWS Technical Career
sessions.description: Get a quick overview of how AWS Tech U helped Dave start his career as a Professional Services Consultant in AWS.

sessions.name: AWS PartnerCast - Co-selling with AWS PrivateLink
sessions.description: Join us for one hour to learn how to co-sell with the AWS Partner Network and AWS Marketplace through AWS PrivateLink. Help your customers securely use SaaS products and on-premises services while learning how to accelerate your co-selling.

sessions.name: AWS Security Services to Protect Your Workloads for AWS Partners
sessions.description: Join us for one hour to learn the foundational security best practices you should apply to AWS workloads. The session includes AWS Security solutions and secure practices for IAM, Infrastructure, Detective Controls, and Incident Response.

sessions.name: Why AWS for digital transformation?
sessions.description: Does your business need to move faster than ever before to meet changing market conditions and customer expectations? Learn how AWS, the leader in cloud technology, can help you transform your business to reach and retain customers, reduce operational costs, and allow your business to scale.

sessions.name: AWS Training and Certification Partner Spotlight: Accenture
sessions.description: Get a quick overview of global system integrator Accenture's human-centric approach to AWS Partner Training and how AWS Training and Certification provides value for its business.

sessions.name: Educator Lina Quintero of ICESI University, Colombia
sessions.description: Get a quick overview of how AWS Academy member institution, ICESI University, in Colombia is preparing students for careers in the cloud.

sessions.name: Learn how Javeriyah went from unemployed to AWS re/Start
sessions.description: Get a quick overview of how Javeriyah went from unemployed to joining the AWS re/Start program.

sessions.name: Architecturer sa gouvernance sur AWS : de Zero à Hero
sessions.description: Comment assurer une sécurité et une compliance à l'échelle? Comment contrôler les couts sur plusieurs projets? comment maintenir les opérations 24/7 sur plusieurs régions? La sécurité, les finances et les opérations sont autant d'éléments importants pour les entreprises dans leur adoption du cloud. Durant cette session, avec Thales DIS on vous partagera des architecture types et des bonnes pratiques sur AWS.
sessions.hiddenTags: __french,design and engineering,security compliance and identity,aws service catalog

sessions.name: Une application résiliente, dans un monde partiellement dégradé
sessions.description: Cloud et Kubernetes, APIs et microservices… Alors que nos architectures s’enrichissent et se complexifient, pouvons-nous encore atteindre « four-nines » de disponibilité, dans un contexte en permanence partiellement dégradé ? En profitant de l’expérience acquise sur 6play, nous verrons quelques pistes pour améliorer la résilience de nos applications, pour qu’elles répondent à nouveau aux besoins de notre public. Nous prononcerons peut-être même le terme de « Chaos Engineering » ;-)

sessions.name: Tecniche per l’ottimizzazione di workload IoT industriali (caso d’uso: Avio Aero)
sessions.description: In questa sessione parleremo di quali pattern architetturali sono a disposizione per ottimizzare workload di industrial IoT. Come caso d'uso pratico, Avio Aero racconterà l'esperienza pluriennale nell’IIoT. Vedremo come Avio ha utilizzato i servizi AWS per migliorare la latenza e l’efficienza di trasmissione dei dati provenienti dai macchinari di officina, fino alla loro memorizzazione e utilizzo nel cloud.

sessions.name: Melhores práticas na construção de um data lake para a saúde
sessions.description: O Hospital Sírio Libanês investiu na construção de um datalake para melhorar o resultado do cuidado ao paciente e também para dar mais visibilidade aos processos internos do hospital. Os aprendizados na construção deste Data Lake servem de base para o conteúdo desta palestra. Serão apresentadas melhores práticas na carga e na governança dos dados. Falamos também, sobre como ferramentas de transformação e anonimização são inseridas no pipeline de dados. Por fim, executamos uma demonstração fim a fim, incluindo a anonimização dos dados privados do paciente. Discutiremos também sobre os resultados obtidos com a implantação do data lake do ponto de vista do hospital como um todo.

sessions.name: 現実世界で活用するAWSサーバーレス・コンテナサービス
sessions.description: "サーバーレス"、"コンテナ"というキーワードは一般的に使われるようになりましたが、自分たちのワークロードにどう活用できるのかイメージできていますでしょうか？このセッションではAWSにおけるサーバーレス/コンテナサービスの選択肢はどんなものがあり、現実世界における幅広いユースケースに対してどのように活用できるのかをご紹介いたします。
sessions.hiddenTags: __japanese,aws fargate,aws lambda,amazon elastic container service (amazon ecs)

sessions.name: Drone Zone
sessions.description: The Drone Zone demonstrates a multi-drone command and control environment powered by AWS IoT Greengrass and IoT. Drone movement and communication are powered with MQTT, seamlessly integrating with AWS IoT device jobs and Device Shadow service. With Amazon SageMaker models deployed to the edge, a drone can identify other drones within its range of vision, and report findings back to AWS IoT Greengrass.

sessions.name: AWS Certified Data Analytics - Specialty
sessions.description: Get a quick overview of how AWS Certified Data Analytics - Specialty validates your expertise in using AWS data lakes and analytics services to get insights from data.

sessions.name: Connected vehicle repair
sessions.description: This is a complete connected digital solution that automates the process of scheduling a vehicle service appointment and warranty claim when a vehicle malfunction or fault is detected. It then uses the data collected from the vehicle to drive an augmented reality/mixed media experience to assist the service technician with completing the vehicle repair, allowing the technician to use a mix of computer graphics, video, audio, and voice to interact in real time with a digital twin of the vehicle. It also integrates with supporting applications like dealer management systems.

sessions.name: Robo van Gogh: Sketching portraits with Amazon Rekognition and AWS IoT
sessions.description: Robo van Gogh recognizes faces, then sketches an artistic rendering in real time. Using Amazon Rekognition and AWS IoT, it asks a user to pose, snaps a portrait, and uses an IoT arm to sketch the user with a graphite pencil on a piece of paper.

sessions.name: Building the pipeline of next-generation tech employees and leaders
sessions.description: Join Bertina Ceccarelli, CEO of NPower, and Lindsey Erlick, product marketing manager for AWS re/Start, as they discuss the importance of up-skilling and mentoring to enable the next generation of diverse builders.

sessions.name: Multilingual omnichannel contact center
sessions.description: This project recognizes the contact center industry’s critical language barrier issue between agents and customers participating in a live chat conversation. It would perform real-time translation of the chat conversation between the agent and the customer and provide a chat-based output to both sides according to their desired languages (the team is also performing research to try this solution for voice-based conversations). The project leverages Amazon Connect to provide a seamless contact center experience, as well as Amazon Translate, Amazon Polly, and Amazon Transcribe.

sessions.name: AWS DeepRacer TV News September: Championship Preview
sessions.description: Dive into the AWS DeepRacer League with news, updates and announcements with host Blaine Sundrud and DeepRacer pit crew experts Chuong Vu and KJ Pittl. In this episode we'll cover championship racing structure for the 2020 league championships at re:Invent Online, as well as results from our September races! You won't want to miss it.

sessions.name: Add image recognition to a web application
sessions.description: Learn how to create a simple React web application with AWS Amplify and add image recognition to read text from images using Amazon Rekognition.
sessions.tags: Front-End Web & Mobile Development,Artificial Intelligence & Machine Learning,Lightning Talk

sessions.name: AWS Tech U: Jillian talks building an AWS Technical Career
sessions.description: Get a quick overview of how AWS Tech U helped Jillian start her career as a Solutions Architect in AWS.

sessions.name: Operational BI: Executing ML models at speed and scale
sessions.description: Executing machine learning (ML) models at the speed and scale of production is a key challenge as enterprises continue to operationalize artificial intelligence. SingleStore, formerly known as MemSQL, provides a converged operational database that combines capabilities found in multiple datastores, such as documents, key-value pairs, stream processors, and relational databases, into a single data platform to activate your most critical data for operational BI and data science. In this talk, Engineering Manager Carl Sverre discusses how SingleStore leverages AWS services in the ML workflow to compile and run Amazon SageMaker models as database functions against real-time data.

sessions.name: Changing the game: Addressing intersectionality with inclusive design
sessions.description: In this session, join AWS Solutions Architect Brian Hammons and Trailhead General Manager Heather Conklin to learn how they have built technical careers in gaming and how they approach inclusion in game technologies.

sessions.name: GrayHair Software: Accelerating innovation by leveraging AWS
sessions.description: GrayHair Software had a 20-year-old technology stack that was extremely expensive to run and did not allow it to innovate and create new products. Learn how, as a result of moving to AWS, the company cut costs, improved customer uptime, and sped up software innovation.
sessions.hiddenTags: __getting_started_lounge,__innovation,__architecture,getting started lounge,amazon redshift,amazon emr (elastic map reduce),amazon workspaces,design and engineering,__design_and_engineering,english

sessions.name: Discover how AWS re/Start is helping individuals launch careers in cloud
sessions.description: Get a quick overview of how AWS re/Start prepares unemployed and underemployed individuals for cloud careers through skills development training. Learn more about the AWS re/Start program and connect with local graduates.

sessions.name: Using AI to automatically find insights in email: A rapid prototyping story
sessions.description: Every day, Liberty Mutual Insurance gets thousands of emails and attachments, and most are manually processed. Join this session for the story of how the Liberty Mutual team built a system that can monitor emails and automatically extract key information and insights from complicated unstructured data like email text and attachments. You learn what the big challenges are in working with unstructured data, how anyone can use serverless and managed AI services such as Amazon Comprehend and Amazon Lex to rapidly iterate, and how to identify where machine learning can provide value for your use case.
sessions.tags: Artificial Intelligence & Machine Learning,Business Intelligence,Dev Chat

sessions.name: How cloud robotics can protect employees and customers
sessions.description: Cloud robotics seems to be the new buzzword in the area of automation, but what does it really mean and how can it benefit your organization? Whether deploying warehouse and factory automation, leveraging autonomous disinfection, or even developing new types of disinfection robots, the flexibility provided by cloud robotics platforms is a must. In this session, learn how cloud robotics can enable remote deployment, social distancing, and autonomous disinfection and eliminate manual material movement. Discover how it can provide advanced ML-based reporting, such as forklift near misses and blocked fire doors, and develop new disinfecting robots in less than two months.

sessions.name: AWS Training and Certification Partner Spotlight: World Wide Technology
sessions.description: Get a quick overview of how World Wide Technology (WWT), an AWS Advanced Consulting Partner, builds skills with AWS Training and Certification to help its customers through all stages of the digital transformation journey.

sessions.name: How AWS Academy empowers higher ed around the world
sessions.description: Get a quick overview of how the AWS Academy program and member institutions are working together to build the next generation of AWS Cloud talent

sessions.name: Construire des workflows complexes de calcul avec AWS Step Functions et AWS Fargate
sessions.description: AWS propose différentes solutions pour gérer les charges de travail distribuées à grande échelle. Au cours de cette session, nous discuterons de la manière dont les clients exploitent AWS Step Function pour gérer des flux de travail complexes et évolutifs. Nous discuterons également de la manière dont les clients migrent les charges de travail sur site vers des architectures serverless optimisées par AWS Fargate et Amazon ECS.

sessions.name: AWSクラウド　アーキテクチャの進化
sessions.description: re:Inventでは毎年多くの新サービス、そしてクラウドアーキテクチャが発表されてきました。そしてAWSのサービス数は175を超え、多くのテクノロジーを包含しクラウドコンピューティングは成長を続けています。このセッションでは、過去re:Inventで発表されたAWSの主要サービスの紹介を主軸としながらクラウドアーキテクチャーの進化を見ていきます。

sessions.name: 우아한형제들의 클라우드 여정
sessions.description: 우아한형제들은 월 천만명 이상의 활성 사용자를 보유한 국내 음식 배달 서비스의 선두 주자입니다. 2016년 AWS 클라우드 이전을 결정한 이후, 비즈니스 확장에 맞게 모든 워크로드를 AWS로 이전해왔습니다. 이 세션에서는 그동안 경험한 클라우드로의 마이그레이션에 대한 과제와 모범 사례를 공유합니다.
sessions.tags: Korean,Startup,Front-End Web & Mobile Development,Travel & Hospitality,Financial Services,Session

sessions.name: Human-centric security: It’s more than just a tagline
sessions.description: The cybersecurity industry is ripe for a human-centric change. When humans are at the center of design thinking, ideas like privacy by design become a reality. And then there are the humans creating the design—they are the soul of cyber. Cyber innovation for the future is powered by inclusion and diversity. Forcepoint initiatives, such as the Global Inclusion Council and the Inclusion Ally program, that give a voice to those who don’t feel they have one present a powerful cybersecurity innovation path forward. Join Forcepoint’s Myrna Soto for an insightful discussion on driving the cyber industry change that is long overdue.

sessions.name: Rock-a-Bye Baby: Intelligent sleep assistant
sessions.description: Studies show that newborns generally sleep 13–16 hours a day, waking up every 1–2 hours. Rock-a-Bye Baby aims to help parents during this demanding period through automation and analytics. It detects when a baby wakes up using motion and cry detection, and it takes different actions to help the baby fall back asleep, such as playing lullabies or sleep sounds, turning on cradle swing, and alerting parents. Using a mobile app, parents can choose the actions, see live video feed, and track their baby’s sleep patterns. The app also notifies parents if it detects significant changes in daily sleep patterns.
sessions.hiddenTags: __builders_fair,__iot,__artificial_intelligence___machine_learning,builders fair,aws iot core,aws iot things graph,aws lambda,__serverless,english

sessions.name: Enabling womxn to lead and succeed in tech
sessions.description: The business case for needing more womxn in tech is widely discussed, but we need to invest just as much attention into celebrating, promoting, and retaining diverse talent within organizations. Come learn critical factors that affect the retention of womxn, including organizational culture, diverse leadership, and career advancement.

sessions.name: Exam Readiness: AWS Certified Database - Specialty
sessions.description: Join us for this 4-hour, on-demand exam readiness session. An AWS trainer will guide you through the AWS Certified Database - Specialty exam structure. Explore the exam’s topic areas and identify areas to study.

sessions.name: AWS Certified Alexa Skill Builder - Specialty
sessions.description: The AWS Certified Alexa Skill Builder - Specialty certification validates the voice experience expertise required to build, test, and publish Amazon Alexa skills. Learn more.

sessions.name: The journey of an AWS CloudFormation template to AWS CDK
sessions.description: Join this session for the journey of an AWS Fargate service and its AWS CodePipeline pipeline from AWS CloudFormation templates to an AWS CDK application. The session walks you through the migration and shows you how existing templates and infrastructure can be used without breaking anything. It also demos how to run AWS CloudFormation and AWS CDK stacks in parallel until everything is migrated to a native AWS CDK application. In the end, the service will be improved with constructs from the community. If you're an AWS CloudFormation user and want to use AWS CDK, this talk is for you. Finally, learn how a migration can be done without taking too much time initially.

sessions.name: How Dream11 created India’s biggest fantasy sports platform with AWS
sessions.description: Dream11 is India’s biggest fantasy sports platform with more than 90 million users, and it’s constantly looking for ways to improve user experience and satisfaction. Learn from CIO Abhishek Ravi about Dream11’s journey with AWS, its scalable initiatives on AWS analytics, and how it’s operating at scale.

sessions.name: Overview of AWS Control Tower for AWS Partners
sessions.description: Join us for one hour to learn about governance at scale by using AWS Control Tower in secure multi-account environments. Review best practices for automating cloud governance in account management, budget enforcement, and security and compliance.

sessions.name: AWS Training and Certification: Meeting the Needs of AWS Partners
sessions.description: Get a quick overview of how AWS Partners utilize the knowledge they've gained from AWS Training and Certification to help their customers innovate in the AWS Cloud.

sessions.name: Du developpement à la mise en production avec Amazon SageMaker
sessions.description: Amazon SageMaker est un service complet d'apprentissage automatique (ML) prévu pour le développement, la formation et le déploiement de modèles de Machine Learning.
